items.sentence: I know the last thing you want to do is hurt me.
I know the last thing you want to do is help me.
I hope the two of you'll be very happy together.
Some of the passengers were pretty badly burned.
Didn't you know Tom and Mary often eat together?
I know that Tom was finished doing that by 2:30.
Tom spent all evening trying to memorize a poem.
Tom is at the counter, drinking a cup of coffee.
Tom could hardly wait to see his children again.
I don't know where Tom will be living next year.
